content.detailedDescription:
I noticed what i thought was a planet (i watch the night sky all time, live right next to airport and know a plane or satellite from star or planet).  a fast blinking light, as bright as a planet, made a very quick 90 degree turn while i was watching it. it started in the southern end of the eastern horizon (south of where orion appears for me).  it moved very fast between blinks, which were fast double blinks each time, and crossed the entire skyline within a matter of a few seconds.  when it was nearing the northern skyline, about 5 inches, from my ground view, it lost it's intensity with each blink and then simply went out.  this was not a satellite, i see them all the time, they do not blink and they move much slower as they cross the sky. it was also not a plane. after living here over ten years, i am aware of what the planes look like as they approach the airport from any direction.  this was not approaching the airport because it was much too high in the sky and moving too quickly.  unfortunately, i did have a camera or phone to document.  as it crossed the sky it made odd moves, like a zigzag pattern; from my viewpoint, it would be about an inch wide zigzag pattern until it began to dim. i did not have usual red lights airplanes do as they move across the sky. this was constant bright white, like a planet, blinked very fast and moved at a speed i've never seen.  there were some wispy clouds in the sky and i was able to see the light through the clouds when it passed above them.  

as a side note, i have always been interested in research to determine the long term effect on a human body if it were subjected to many years (thousands) in space?  would the body's structure end up looking similar to what is so commonly reported?  large eyes and head to account for changes from the darkness of space and changes in skull, along with complete loss of muscle mass from the lack of gravity and the skin color or thickness due to the effects of space.  i would be very interesting to see what science would conclude a human body would look like and how much it would resemble the commonly known/seen grays; short or tall. just a thought which continually comes to mind every time i watch or think about this ufo topic.  i hope you are able to compile a group of experts willing to utilize their resources to determine if my theory may have any merit.  i may be on the right track about the origin of the intelligent beings.  who knows, maybe this is the answer to where the mayans or other similar groups disappeared to. anything could be the answer or possible regarding this topic. if you are, or do decide, to research this theory, please let me know so i can follow any results.

my agreement to your release regarding third party investigation is only under the condition my information continue to be anonymous to the general public.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright as star, very fast blinking, across eastern sky (s to n) w/in ~3seconds w/ 90 dgr turn + zigzagging. it blinked out before reaching edge of horizon.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving south/west on hwy 156 from santa ynez,ca towards santa barbara, ca. we noticed lights in the sky as it is very dark with no business or residential in the area. we saw five light sources, that were some what circular in shape. the circled around each other while moving left to right in the sky.The entire group of lights moved individually but at the same time moved in unison left to right in the horizon. then all lights became one and disapeared at once.
content.summary: Five light sources moved

content.detailedDescription:
this is something that always haunted me for an answer.
 i was only about eight years old. i dont remember the exact date. i know it would have had to been before 78 because i moved from lansdale to harleysville pa. anyhow, this is what happened. 
 i was with some friends hanging out at the oak park school in lansdale pa. i grew up on pine street which intersects the school property. i was on the school property with some friends on what i believe was later in the day. it was summer and it was one of those days where you could see a large full moon. the moon was lined up towards my house on pine street so we were looking towards my house from the school. we saw a very large object orbit the moon starting from the top and working its way to the bottom. as it got to the backside it disapered. i could have not been the only one on this day to see this. i think that the object was too big to be man made. it looked like a meteor but i dont think the moon has much gravity to make a big object orbit. any ideas? please drop me an email.
content.summary: Something orbiting the moon

content.detailedDescription: I first saw these lights in the sky about 2 months ago while i was standing outside of my house. i first saw this bright light late one night and thought it was a bright star, but as i watched it started to move, darting around the sky, zig-zagging and going in circles. it started out as just one but then recently i've been noticing more and more, i've counted 12 to 15. the weird thing is that they are out every night and usually in the same spot in the sky, moving with the night sky. they move around much too fast to be a satellite or anything that could be man made. i see them in groups of 3, forming a triangle, but i do not think they are physically connected because they all move independently from one another. there is one that is much brighter then all the rest, which was the first one that i spotted. i see these lights from sun down to sun up, or at least until i go to bed and they are there in the sky every night.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Lights moving in the sky at night

content.detailedDescription: We were traveling down south 9th street in mattoon, il on the afternoon of october 29th, heading north. i happened to look out of our car's windshield and saw a jet with a trail behind it, and directly below it, a large white object traveling at what i first thought was the same speed as the commercial jet. after watching for a few seconds, it almost looked as if the jet, which was higher up, was somehow escorting the larger, lower object. i joked that it must be air force one and the jet was it's "wingman". my husband also saw this object and we stopped the car to watch it. we could not figure out what it could be. it was either cigar-shaped or cylindrical in shape and appeared to be totally white. it left no jet trail or any evidence that it was flying in the air. it didn't shine or sparkle against the sun, but seemed more matte in it's appearance. it traveled toward the west, but didn't seem to move overly fast or bank in any direction. the object went in a very straight trajectory and appeared to move at the same pace for the duration of the sighting. we watched it until it faded out of sight into the sky. we both were at a loss to explain what this object was.
content.summary: White, cigar-shaped object flying near commercial jet

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my hotel room, on the 23rd floor, looking out of the open balcony door at about 3:15am.  towards the st. louis arch, i saw a v-shaped craft moving at a speed that was too slow for an airplane to remain in the air.  i saw seven lights in an amber color in a v-shape on the bottom of the craft as it flew over the arch at about 2,000 feet.  it made absolutely no sound.  it was heading south along the mississippi river, then vanished into the night.  i continued to watch to see if i could see airplanes, i could see the strobes from the airplanes from a distance.  the craft had no strobe lights.
content.summary: V-shape over st. louis arch

content.detailedDescription:
This was before i knew about sfo's
i was making a night crossing to catalina island. i had hit it a little east of two harbors so i headed west. about 10 min going west, and all of a sudden the ocean lit up like a built in pool about 100 yards on both sides of me. now im a night scuba diver and know how light goes under water, but this was differant, the light was in a perfect square, besides the ocean lighting up right under my boat, the light being in a square seemed odd to me. it only lasted about 15 sec, but when i reached two harbors, it seemed like i lost 2 hours, it was very late and i never thought much about the time then. remember, i never saw an object, just a bright light. it wasn't untill a couple of years latter i learned about sfo's. great job you guys are doing, the truth will come out if you keep this up.

[last name removed cms/dr]
content.summary: Light in the ocean

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were walking down the street to go to a restaurant.  i was looking up to see if there were any meteors because some were expected this day.  i then saw a bright star like object moving across the sky like a satellite, but a bit brighter than a satellite given it wasn't crystal clear enough to see satellites so easily - i tracked it behind trees as we walked but looked forward to a clearing ahead to point it out to my wife.  30 seconds later we got to the spot and i stopped her to point up at the small high up light.  at that point, stopped on the sidewalk we both shouted out in surpise - it wasn't following a normal trajectory, it started turning sharply then reversed direction very fast, like an insect flying.  it then disappeared from my view totally but my wife was looking toward a point of the sky where she was able to see it for a few more seconds, before she said it moved back and forth a little bit before taking off at an impossibly fast speed.  

it was very far away, not a satellite and not a meteor, also not a planet - i'm an amateur astronomer and jupiter was very bright and right next to the moon at the time - in fact it was one of the brightest moon nights i've ever seen, so perhaps the moon reflection is the source of light on whatever it was.

mostly disbelieving my own eyes. still trying to come up with explanations like my own dizziness that made stars seem to move around or something, and i might have convinced myself if not for the 2nd witness confirmation of everything i saw and more.  just very interesting really.

i really just want to know from someone if anyone else saw something like this on this night.
content.summary: I thought it was a high up bright satellite when looking up to see meteor shower, but then wife & i saw it then turn, reverse, accelerate, and eventually disappear. flight was irratic and fast but it was just a star-like object, very high up.

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend of mine, were traveling north on highway 131. we were just getting near our exit which is 36(were currently passing exit 34) just talking about work and stuff when all of a sudden this bright bluish green sphere just appear towards the horizon. in amazement we both just watched as this object just bursted right through the cloud it seemed like. it only lasted a few seconds. at first i thought it could've been a plane or a helicopter but the light was 10x's bigger than the lights of a plane or helicopter. than i thought, maybe a missil, but than still, a missile would leave a streak or something. it also looked as if it would hit the ground. with the speed and trajectory it looked in possible to pull of. it just dissapeared. me and my friend were extremely excited because we've been watching shows of ufo's and aliens since we were kids. i instantly than knew that it had to be something from outta this world.
content.summary: Bright turquois light in sky. speeding vertically downward in a controlled manor. it split a small cloud, but left no streaks as if a falling plane or jet would produce.

content.detailedDescription: Was listening to a radio station 9.91 classical station, i heard 2 beeps, than a lady interrupted and said a ufo hand landing somewhere in pennsvania i believe she said on a ranch advised town to board up windows store food and protect family, also said crop cicles appeared in anumber of locations including idaho, this is a serious radio staion not known for haoxes , cnat you tell me if you haveany reports.
content.summary: Broadcast news

content.detailedDescription: i  was  with my  2  cousins  at  flax  pond  and we  were  just   walking by, and  i told  them  to  just  look at  the  sky and  we  just  were  looking  for  like a  good  minute   as  we  were walking into the  basket ball  court  and  then  me  and my  other  cousin had  seen a white  objest   and atfirst  it  seemed  like a  star from a  distace  .  out  of  nowhere  the  star  moved  in  a  c motion  like from the  bottom of the   c  to  the   top it  all  happened  in too  seconds... my  first reacton  was  shock  all 3  of  us  staired  into the sky  in utter   fear .. i  tried  to  convice them it  was a   coment  or  astrode  anything  but  the  fact  that  it was  in one spot  at  first  then  moved  up the  sky  and  not  down  to  earth...It was  white  circle  looked  like  a star  but  it  hd  a  white  flma e like  a  tennis  ball in fire  but  all  like  white.My  feelings to  this  is  i  need  is  shock  , im  still in schock this happened  last  night.Ive  been  thinking  of  it  ever  since.  i lost  sight  of  it   wen  it  disaperd  all  within  2  seconds  of  noticing  it  ,  it  just  vanished  ...
content.summary: White  light   not a  star  it  was  moving up the  sky not  down to  earth

content.detailedDescription:
Nothing to tell really, i was just going over photos when i noticed something different in the sky. when i zoomed in on the image it seemed to be very unusual, unidentified.

the photo was taken at my son's special soccer game at the naval academy in annapolis. i did not notice it when taking the photos.

the original photo is attached and two that i had enhanced to define the image.
content.summary: Accidentally captured on digital camera

content.detailedDescription:
Was driving east from burlington, il towards st. charles, il on 10/27/10. around 9pm we noticed an unusual amount of lights on the horizon, which i dismissed as just a bunch of planes in a holding pattern on their way to land at o'hare in chicago. 

when the airport is busy or backed up, we can often see a few planes on their way towards us or those that already went that past us, turned overhead & are on their way back towards o'hare to land. what we saw on 10/27 was 3 distinct "strings", each made of 10-15 points of light, that extended up from the horizon & curved over high in the night sky.

we could see planes to the left & right of the strings of light which moved into or out of our field of vision. i'm submitting this report because the points of light that made up the "strings" did not move.

after my passenger insisted the lights were not moving, i pulled over to confirm & we watched for several minutes. we then continued east to route 64 (north ave.) taking it through st. charles, il to the dupage airport (arriving at 9:30pm) where there was open space to take another look. strings of lights were still visible. we continued east on route 64 to route 59 (where there's several large stores with large open parking lots), arriving at route 59 at 9:45pm. strings of lights were gone.
content.summary: 3 strings of lights extending in a curved line from the horizon into the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work. on 422 west just before the ext for royorsford. two objests apered they looked like two stars. they were vary bright bighter then the stares i have ever seen. there placement in the sky was one was in the senator. the other was on the left side and it was on top. the two light began to get bigger, brighter. at the same time like some1 had a dimmer swich and was making them brighter. they were to fare apart to be a plaine or a jet or a hellcopter. there were no green or red flashing lights or strob light. when the two objects began to get dimmer. they did it at the same time like some one had them on a dimmer switch. they got to the point were i could not see them any more. you could see the stars vary well and you could tell ware the were. i would have bin able to see them move away because they would have blocked out the stars if they had moved. they simply just disaperded. what made me notice them was i'm always looking for ufos. i have seen a lot they i can not expain being anything else but them. i have bin looking for ufos for about ten years and i can tell you the difference between a shooting stare,satlights,plains,jets,helicopters. when i first noticed it i thought they have might bin two plains.
content.summary: One on top of the other bright lights then got out at the se time

content.detailedDescription: While sitting outside smoking late one night i noticed a meteor falling slowly to the ground. before impact the meteor became brighter. i ran inside my apartment and got my camera, to get a better view i went upstairs on the balcony and took this video. i zoomed in my camera and then began filming because my camera cannot be zoomed while filming. i didn't think i had gotten anything, since it was so dark and was pointed at the night sky. it wasn't until i was downloading some other images off my camera, i seen the file and then took a look at it on my big screen monitor.. wow.... the triangular lights i had captured with my digital camera was unexplainable to me, so maybe you can tell me what this is!!
content.summary: This is the lights following a meteor

content.detailedDescription:
Hi, please check radars at palm springs california on february 22 2010. there is no way in heck that tower 
missed this one unless they launched this thing, or they are seriously blind or just plain lying period,
  i seriously don't think they launched , as the 
craft was longer and appeared wider than the airport itself much much much larger i personally have worked 
with the military over the years including the skunk facility in seattle washington they claim 
is only a simple aircraft building facilty, wrong. stealth
hidden in plain view as they put it.
i never saw or even seen drawing like what we saw that night at boeing.
 skunk facility yes, i snooped around and saw the future to come well the concepts and a few 
blue prints labeled classified/mantess it appeared to be a high tech version of our current f-18 
but way beyond cooler looking!!!  there were several prints all different just laying around or on 
drawing tables.
 we were maintenance contractors hired after the last big quake in seattle around 2006?  well boeing considered
 there facility high priority to repair asap so did the state??? why unknown

anyway's you wont believe the size of the black craft that flew over the valley that night 
between 7pm and 9pm << this time frame is not exact as i was not paying attention to the time as 
we just left the movie house and were on our way home.

 the first thing i thought of was the arizona lights which i for the longest
 time simply thought was a hoax. ?
this craft was not that same craft, i decided this after spending 
the last 4 months on google reading every report on the arizona lights i could find
 the arizona craft was smaller than what we witnessed in my own opinion.
 one other fact i saw this thing so  well i 
noticed there were no lights at all on the bottom or sides of the craft we drove north and 
it crossed our path heading south by south east then when it finally passed up it suddenly 
turned due east and then north east. this craft was a giant black and grey rectangle or square
 with a rounding side-walls with what appeared to be square top
it looked kinda like a oil refineries cooling towers or fan exhaust ports ive never seen such 
a design in a craft of any-kind this craft looked as if it was military in design if you asked 
me a guy who been around military bases my whole life it would definatly bring a new meaning to the word stealth.
 the problem claiming manmade is it's size no way any 
airport in cali could launch a craft of such size???
 unless it came from a hidden base ??? i cant explain this at all.
all i know is this thing is
 real i saw it and watched it for what i call a real reality check in life and situation time unexplained.
 we are defiantly not alone.
 me and my girl watch it for over ten to fifteen minutes fly over us less than 400-ft off the 
ground and not making any sound at all.
 the way i interpet what we saw to folk around here is it 
was like a train going buy you know the one that never seems to end holding you up for 10 -15
 minutes, well this train seemed to be clippen along pretty good then took two big left turns.

 guys i saw in the windows on the front of this craft! its what got my attention in the first place not the craft itself.
 a green light coming right at us when i realized what i was looking at was a giant windshield with a green 
light emitting from it 
 yes it was that big.
we drove north for over ten minutes at a speed around 40 mph through town the whole time this 
craft was flying over us at a slower speed my guess 20 mph.

theres more.

if this story gets your attention approx 6 months later i saw something in the north skies that still blows my mind more so 
than what i just told you. 

please understand i would have never in my lifetime told you folks any of this if this was a one time thing but twice in ones 
lifetime whats the odds?

even seeing one sighting i lean towards telling folks there nuts not anymore.


source: *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg) no im not nutz well not yet.
sorry folks no picture even if i had a good camera it was simply to black to even get a good picture sorry i would love to meet a real artist to draw this thing to scale as i got a real good look many details.
content.summary: Massive black square or rectangle flew directly over us

content.detailedDescription:
On the 14th of august, 2007 i was on a patrol spotting for forest fires. my job at the time was a wild land fire-fighter. i was in my truck at the time by myself about 3-3:35am on united states forest service road 456 and turning on to placer creek rd. on moon pass. 
as i was turning my truck on to placer creek rd. i seen what i thought was a camp and or wildfire, coming from a tree line about 230 feet to the left side of my truck. at first the light came off dim, but then got brighter and i studied it. i went to radio myself in to report the light i thought was fire, but my radio was fuzzing in and out and would not send to the dispatch center.
about this time i seen the light at super speeds jump out of the tree line in to the sky. i seen what looked like a bullet shape dart of in to the night sky.

i can remember thinking it was time to put out a fire and hope i could stop it before it got out of hand and had to call in a i.R. team. i also remember taking maybe i should just watch it and see if it was just a group of campers. as i seen the light move back and fourth i also remember thinking ok this is a wildfire i need to take action and report it. 
when having problems with my radio i seen the light at super speeds jump out of the trees in to the sky i remember being very scared and my heart racing. i've never seen any thing like this before.

i looked myself in my fire truck and hid in back set. after i calmed down i remember being lost and confused as to what just happened. i thought i was going to die that night.
content.summary: Was on a patrol in the forest when i seen a star like light bullet shape shout out of the tree line.

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside for a cigarette with two of my friends and half way through our conversation we noticed a low flying object coming from the west heading to the east-northeast.  the brightest "star" in the sky is actually a planet tonight, what i believe to be jupiter, but i'm not positive if it is actually jupiter just to be clear, but the date is october, 28, 2010. and i live in eastern south dakota, so you at mufon should know what planet i am talking about.  it has been clearly visible every stary night for several weeks now from my vantage point.  this object was much brighter than what i believe to be jupiter, the brightest object in the sky from my vantage point.  it slowly moved to the east in what appeared to be a straight line.  this object was bright white light much like the stars appear but much brighter and much clearer. it passed slightly to the south of where i was standing, but shortly after it turned a red orange color it had to be east of the town i live in, and then it simply dissapeared.  vanished.  it was a very clear night tonight.  i could clearly see geese flying south tonight in the same night sky.  it may have lasted up to two minutes.  it was some time between 7:45pm - 8:30pm central time usa time.  this was unlike anything i've ever seen!!!
content.summary: West to the east bright white light slow moving silent bright like jupiter turning a red orange and vanished clear sky

content.detailedDescription: Disc ufo with rotating multicolored lights over a local elementary school (estimated location)  the view was brief, possibly 5 minutes.  this occurance was combined with a curious meteorological event at a separate part of town (to the east) where there was an amorphous red luminous event, with the appearance of dripping glowing blood.  all of this needs to be confirmed with a friend, but the event is inextricable from my memory.
content.summary: A stereotypical disc ufo with green red possibly green lights hovering over a part of midland

content.detailedDescription: I was working as a mover with my dad and his co-workers. we were relocating a saturn car dealer's offices. we had finished loading a truck, the truck and most of the crew took off to the new building for drop off unloading. myself and another worker were left behind to watch over the boxes that were left behind. we were sitting down taking a break, the workers from the dealership then came out to have a cigarrate (about 4 people) when i one of them ;an asian lady, say : oh my god look! so i looked up at the sky and there it was. an enormous flying disc hovering behind a two cypress trees. the disc after  hovering for about 10 seconds, turned sideways, now looking like a circle rather than a disc. the disc then decended behind the cypress trees. and a split second later a bright golden sphere apeared from the sky at light speed and flew around the sky looking for the flying saucer . the sphere then ascended and disapeared in the sky. by that time we were all engaged in a conversation. we were all amazed . but that incident left me thinking that perhaps these ufo's are at odds with eachother. like at war or something. i mean why would one hide from the other?
content.summary: Silver metalic flying disc hiding from a bright golden sphere

content.detailedDescription: I was at an apartment parking lot which is across the street from south point casino in las vegas. all of a sudden something in the sky catches my attention because it was really bright. at first i tought that the color of the casino was shinning on the objects making them look orange, but after a couple of seconds i see that the three objects are in fact orange and they are close to each other moving from side to side and heading south towards california. they were flying slow and not high up, and it seemed like one was getting too close to the other one like if it was going to crash into it. i felt confused because i was amazed and afraid at the same time because i had no idea what it could be. they did not have any flashing lights like airplanes have, i really feel like they were not from this world. after about 5 minutes i could not see them anymore because the apartments were in the way. i will never forget what i saw and it just makes me wonder what's out there.
content.summary: I saw three orange ufo's flying close to each other

content.detailedDescription:
this was the last week (wed i believe) of may 2009. we was staying at a hotel called the ocean reef in north myrtle beach, south carolina. our room was on the 11th floor facing the ocean and it was about 11:30 at night. 
 1st i seen 2 white balls coming in over the water towards the hotel that looked at 1st like headlights on a car, but when they got closer they split and went into different directions. these white balls moved around and then was gone. they reappeared a few min later in a different area again for a few secons, then was gone.
 we sat and watched for a few minutes and was getting ready to go back inside when we noticed a high fog coming in. not low over the water but higher up that our hotel. all a sudden an object seem to move out of this fog that was hugh. i believe it was triangle shape because i could see what i thought was the front of the object and lights that ran down the right side. i couldn't see the left side. the lights on the side we could see was white and glowed. the lights was going from bright to dim making it look like the lights was running from front to back(right to left. we watched this for about 3 to 5 minutes and it went dark. i went inside to get my cell phone to get a picture but it never lite up again. the fog slowly went back over the water.
 i looked down at the beach below and seen a couple standing there. they didn't move and finally sat down on the beach. i left my room and went down to the beach and talked to the young couple that was in there mid twenties. i asked if they had seen anything and they seemed to be very confussed and said they were not sure what they had seen but described pretty much what i had seen my self.
 the reason i'm sending this is to see if anyone else has reported seeing this beside us? pls let me know.

 thanks *(wit's first name deleted--cms/sg).
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Was on 11th floor  looking out at the ocean.  i seen 1st 2 white balls coming towards the shore like headlights that spit and went in different directions. later seen a hugh pointed thing with muli lights running down its side.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i viewed the object around 6:30 or 7pm or so.  there appeared to be three crafts but we had our camera trained on one.  they were not helicopters nor planes as we know them.  they had multiple lights and a bright light that increased and decreased in intensity.  the one craft moved back and forth for a span of about 3 miles or so.

obviously as you watch the clip we filmed, youll see that we did the best we could but didnt know what the heck we were doing.  youll hear us on the phone with a local news desk.  this was taken after watching this thing for approximately 10-12 minutes or so.  we watched it move back and forth from our living room and then went out on the deck to see if we could capture it on film.  sorry the film is so lousy...But anyone can see it lights up like a christmas tree as if to signal two other objects (which we were not able to capture).  the various colored lighting was of a type weve never seen before.

the light went from brilliant to dim. as it appeared to come inland and a bit too close and we went back into the house.  we tried contacting the news station and the sf chronicle and there was no interest.  this is fine with us because we know what we saw and we're not concerned with peddling the footage.  when we isolated one of the clips and zoomed in, we could clearly see the shape of the craft the light was reflecting.

i was just watching tv and a show on ufos featured your organization..So we thought at least we wouldn't be perceived as kooks if we contacted you. let us know if your interested in the footage.  we'd be glad to get it to you. the entire clip is too big to email so i'll need advice.  i've broken a piece down to send, so i hope it goes through.
take care.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Craft with slowly pulsating light moving back and forth over the bay

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the back yard smoking a cigarette at night, and i always look up in the sky allways.. and i notice the big oranges lights.. wow. so big .So big..The birst thing in my mind was my god i'm so lucky to see this event ,it will never happend to me again ,the first time when i saw it cross my mind this is not man made and if it is ??? ,i was in shock.
i was looking at this thing and it was moving so slow ,to slow and no sound at all and i open the back door and call for my girlfriend ...Come and see this right now . i look up again and it was gone in les than 2 secs  the object was in a shape of a  " v " but it was so big maybe 12 to 16 times bigger than a 737 airplanes... my girfried come over and then both of us saw 2 lights going up in less than a sec . i haven't toll any one about this .
content.summary: 7 big orange light . no noise at all and the biggest i ever sow in my life .

content.detailedDescription: This occured in nw okc at my home in our side yard where we have a large cement area with a fire pit, hot tub, and suana. it started at 8:50 with a boomerang craft traveling approx. 25 mph and 80' high going north to south. i watched it for approx 20 seconds and within 2 minutes of it passing a small grey sphere with a reddish tint (about the size of a basketball) flew directly over my head approx 20' high high traveling west to east about 15 mph. at this time my wife came home and we sat in the hot tub and watched a small diamond shaped ufo pass over, followed by a boomerang object, then a 100' long white straight object, another boomerang object, a huge triangle object that was massive in size, 3 more pass overs by a medium boomerang object and the last instance was a very large bomerang object. 11 objects in 1 hr 20 minuntes and then it ended without seeing anything more and we went to bed. we are in the hot tub almost every night and never saw a thing ever until sunday and now this week has been crazy. tonight was beyond belief. there is something going on and why they are picking our side yard for their flight path is unreal. every craft has traveled within 50' of the exact same path and all within the edge of our roof to the middle of our side yard and none anywhere else. they all don't appear coming at us from a distance, but they originate at the beginning of our yard from nowhere. we have only seen objects from 8:50 to 10:10, nothing before and nothing after. we have a small mag. flashlight and shined it up on each one as it flew over to help see them. some had faint lighting and some no lights at all. we are in total shock that this is happening and they seem to be targeting us. we are buying a large mag light tomorrow and will set up the video camera on a tripod. has anyone ever experienced anything like this? please email me if you have ever had something like this happen to you or can tell us why they may be targeting us. our email is *(wit's email address deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Ufo display  - 11 objects in 1 hour 20 minutes - all almost identical path

content.detailedDescription: Every morning as i am getting ready for work, i look up at orion (this time of year), and it just so happened that the moon was out too. looking up at the moon, i observed an object that was at a dead stop directly centered under the wanning (phase) of the moon. this ruled out a jet flying in the sky. the object and contrail matched that of the object taped over the china airport in july? of 2010. the moon light illuminated the contrail and the object, both of which appeared to be pure white in color with a slight blue tinge on the coned shaped object. under the moon light, it was difficult to say if the object was putting out any light of its own, but both object and contrail was very reflective of the moon light. after watching the object for about 2 mins, during which time it remained stationary in the same spot, i finished loading up my car for work. (which only took less than a minute). upon looking back at the area where the object had been, not only was the object gone.............But so was the contrail (which had been very evident, and didn't appear to have been dissipating during the initial viewing period). for the object to be gone was one thing, but for the contrail to be gone too caught me as strange. upper winds were not strong that morning. being an amateur astronomer for years, i have never seen anything like this, nor have i seen anything that i couldn't explain........Until that morning.
content.summary: Cone shaped object with contrail shaped like the one video taped over china airport

content.detailedDescription: One day when i was sixteen one of my friends came to me and asked me if i would help him get some copper because he wanted to junk it and make some money. i said sure. we went down a trail through the woods that led to the place were he had seen a couple of large copper radiators that he wanted to try to junk for money. we got to the place. we got on each side of one of the radiators and carried it a ways back the way we had came. my friend said "lets drop this one here for now and go get the other one". i said ok. we then put the radiator in the ditch on the side of the road.(this was at about five o clock in the afternoon in the summer) while i was in the ditch something in the bushes caught my attention. it was a rod lying on the ground. it was about eight to ten inches long and had glowing green triangles in vertical lines from top to bottom. i remember thinking to myself...Wow thats really neat looking and i reached down to pick it up. the next thing i remember is comming to my senses. me and my freind were walking down the road away from were we had been in the ditch.(the sky was starting to get dark which struck me as strange because it had been light just a few momments ago) i looked over at him and i was about to ask him if he saw something in the bushes when a bright blue flash happened. when we turned around we saw something shoot up off the ground in a red trail. we saw this very clearly. when it reached the top of the trees it changed into a green fireball and shot down across the woods at treetop level. we then turned and ran all the way to my house. we told my mother what we saw. she did not beleve us. later on when i asked my friend what he had seen in the bushes he said he had seen a rod object with glowing red triangles on it. i have no idea what we saw or what happened to us that day. i have often thought about undergoing hypnosis to find out what happened during my missing time.
content.summary: My friend and i saw glowing rods in the bushes. when i reached for it,  i dont remember what happened. when i came to i saw a blue flash. a fireball objct flew away.

content.detailedDescription:
i was awakened from sleep a little after 3 a.M. on the morning of october 18,  2009, by something which i can't explain.  my twelve year old dog was sleeping on the bed next to me, when i was awakened by my two five month old puppies barking like crazy. the puppies, because they were so young, were crated overnight in the tiled entryway of the house. my room is at the opposite end of the hallway. as i awoke to their barking, i opened my eyes and noticed my room was very light. there are heavy, double layered light filtering shades at the bay window across my room. the light was so bright it was lighting the room as it came in through the cracks between the shades and the window frame. it also showed through the layers of material. the only time which could provide any kind of comparable light overnight would be a full moon, and this light was much brighter, and the moon wasn't full that evening.
  as  i awoke and my brain began to quickly notice something was very different, my mind immediately began to race. as i lay there thinking, "what is that?", "why is it so bright?"' "why is there no sound?"' i was also thinking, "don't move, don't make a sound, don't get up and look", even though i wanted very much to know what it was outside my bedroom window.  as i lay and watched it, the constant bright light changed into a pulsing red light. the two lights didn't show simultaneously. there was one very bright, sustained white light which changed into a red light that seemed to pulse in and out at a 1-2 second rate. i'm noting that because i thought it could possibly be a helicopter, but as far as i know, the red and white lights on a helo run simultaneously.  
  so i waited it out silently, without moving, and  quite honestly, feeling terrified. as the red pulsing light converted back to the bright white light, it brightened for a much briefer time, then faded with only a whoosh. the whoosh was the only sound i'd heard during the entire experience. it definitely was not the typical sound associated with a helicopter flying out. 
  there are some other reasons this experience seemed odd. my room is on the second floor of the house. outside, below the window, there's a swimming pool. on one end, there's a large oak tree.  about 50-60 feet away, there are some large magnolia trees. behind the pool is a tall line of cypress trees. anyone trying to come in with a chopper and searchlight would have to fly over the cypress trees, and dip between the oak and the magnolia trees to be positioned in the spot where the light was shining from. based on the angle it was hitting the windows,  it seemed level with the second floor or slightly above, but still well below the tops of the trees. that would be some fancy flying for the wee hours of the morning in a residential area.  after the light dimmed, the dogs stopped barking, but the light on the back deck remained on for a few more minutes. it's on a motion sensor, and we do have a cat, so i'm not prepared to make any connections to the other lights. 
  the last time i remember checking the time was 5:30 a.M., since i couldn't get back to sleep before then. the next day, after thinking about the lights a little more, i told one family member. i still can't explain it based on the information i've seen. i've tried over the last year to rationally explain it, but i can't. the experience has stayed with me, and is still as real as it was that evening. that's why i'm reporting it now. perhaps the folks with mufon can shed some light on the matter.
 
  after the light dimmed and i heard the whoosh, i couldn't go back to sleep again for a couple of hours. the last time i remember checking the clock was 5:30 a.M.
content.summary: Bright white light converting to red pulsating light, with no sound, and only a subtle whoosh as the light dimmed and seemed to fade

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside at night with 3 other people in my backyard. it was around 10:40pm or so, nearing 11pm. from my backyard i am able to see a view of the el paso mountains in the distance, and am able to see transmountain road, which is a long road that is a shortcut to get from the northeast side of town to the west side by cutting through rather than going around the mountain. from our view you can see the headlights driving by from the cars in a certain area that drive by, but they are high up in elevation on the lower half of the mountain from the view we have.

two of us (myself and another) were sitting in the backyard facing away from the mountain, while the other two were sitting able to view the mountains and transmountain road, and one of them noticed this faint light above the mountains, she pointed and asked what it was, it was probably a hundred feet above or so, not sure but it was high up enough to look like a star, because that's what we thought it was. 

thankfully, she didn't believe it was a star - and kept staring at it and suddenly told us it was moving, so we all turned to focus on it, it was so faint we didn't think anything of it for a couple of minutes except it was this hazy purple, it was the exact coloring if you stare at a black light, you can't really focus on it and it had this purple tone to it. we thought there might be a cloud in front, but it was a clear night, the object was hazy.

so trying to focus on it in the sky, we can begin to see this faint purple/blue light begins to slowly move, side to side, diagonally, in very unusual patterns at different speeds, and then it began to slowly fly behind the mountain, and as we watched it, for about 5 to 10 seconds it went out of sight. we thought that was all there was to it, but we stayed looking, we all kind of wished it would come back, and we got our wish...

it suddenly came back up and began to float down the mountain but it moves down in different ways, at first it went straight down and then diagonally, just erratic movements and it suddenly gets closer to the cars that are driving on transmountain, so we see this faint purple light get closer and closer to the cars and two of us are really scared that it will crash down, but the other two people with me tried to get out a really bad telescope of mine that didn't work properly - but hoping to be able to use it to see what this object is!

then it suddenly pauses in front of one of the cars, almost like the object hit the brakes and it lights up so brightly i squinted, and we all just gasped in awe and fear.

then immediately it shot down below the road into the base of the mountain near an area that has no residential homes, it shot down from the right, then to the left and then out of sight. being so scared we were expecting to see it come back up into the sky, maybe even fly over us but thankfully nothing. we called into the non emergency phone line in el paso to ask if anyone had seen strange lights, and they told us no.

after that, a day later we went up to transmountain to see if we could see anything below in the desert, and of course we found nothing unusual looking.

i've been in the mid 90's strange objects in the sky over ft. bliss (military base) area which is east of where i live, objects that would blink and shine light onto the roof of the house in front of ours (without any sound, like a helicopter light should have), but never have i seen this black light colored object, erratically flying around near where a lot of cars drive back and forth 24/7, and if it was anything government made, we wondered why it would be so close to cars, seemed dangerous. i just wonder if the drivers on transmountain saw the object, because when it lit up so bright it seemed everyone would have been able to see it! but it seems nobody noticed it but us that night, and we stayed out for many nights after that hoping to see it again but we haven't yet.
content.summary: Strange star-like object hovering over el paso mountains, almost hit car and swooped down below the road (on mountain) disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: A life-long friend and i were laying video games when we decided to take a smoke break.  we were not drinking and had taken no drugs.  we went out front of his apartment and lit our smokes when he said "dave come here you have to see this!", a decorative brick wall was obstructing my view of the sky when he said this.  i stepped out from the wall and my heart sank as i witnessed two round objects emitting light that was not strobing moving through the sky towards each other as if they were on a collision course.  both objects did not appear to be at the same level of height as the one on the left appeared as if it were moving down and towards the other while the one on the right was moving in to the left.  both objects than stopped leaving a small gap and didn't move for about half a minute.  then, they both seemed to move at the same time alligning one above the other as the object to the left went northeast and the object on the right went southwest.  they alligned perfectly as if they were one, and stayed like this for about 10-20 seconds.  the one on top then suddenly began to move in the same direction i originally witnessed it in and disappeared within seconds.  while the one below it stayed where it was at for over an hour.
content.summary: Sightings took place in vandalia facing the direction of wright-patterson air force base.
